argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_flddivrng | |- ( K e. Fld -> K e. DivRingOps ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fldcrng | |- ( K e. Fld -> K e. CRingOps ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( K e. Fld -> ( K e. DivRingOps /\ K e. CRingOps ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_iscrngo | |- ( K e. CRingOps <-> ( K e. RingOps /\ K e. Com2 ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprbi | |- ( K e. CRingOps -> K e. Com2 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elin | |- ( K e. ( DivRingOps i^i Com2 ) <-> ( K e. DivRingOps /\ K e. Com2 ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_biimpri | |- ( ( K e. DivRingOps /\ K e. Com2 ) -> K e. ( DivRingOps i^i Com2 ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-fld | |- Fld = ( DivRingOps i^i Com2 ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl6eleqr | |- ( ( K e. DivRingOps /\ K e. Com2 ) -> K e. Fld ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( K e. DivRingOps /\ K e. CRingOps ) -> K e. Fld ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_impbii | |- ( K e. Fld <-> ( K e. DivRingOps /\ K e. CRingOps ) ) |
